md:
giải nghĩa từ "terrific" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Terrific (adjective)
	+ Meaning: extremely good or exciting
	+ Vietnamese: tuyệt vời, tuyệt vời, rất hay
	+ Example sentence: "The fireworks display was terrific, it was the best one I've ever seen."
	+ Related words: fantastic, amazing, incredible, awesome

* Terrific (adjective, informal)
	+ Meaning: very bad or unpleasant
	+ Vietnamese: rất tệ, rất xấu
	+ Example sentence: "The movie was terrific, I walked out of the theater after 30 minutes."
	+ Related words: terrible, awful, horrible, dreadful

Note: The second meaning of "terrific" is informal and not commonly used in formal writing or speech. It's often used in a sarcastic or ironic way to express that something is very bad.
